sections.name: page_1
pages: ["",{"translate":"%1$s%3427655$s","with":[{"text":"The Iacio Shamir is found on Barium Bands. It can be placed onto chestplates.\n\nItems, Tridents, Ender Pearls, Splash and Lingering Potions, Snowballs, and Eggs will fly farther when thrown."},{"translate":"text.gm4.guidebook.iacio_shamir.2"}]}]
